title: Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Sting, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are roleblock and control immune.
- If a player you Stung the previous night is hanged, you will gather honey from your bees. From now on, when you Sting a player, learn who they intended to visit.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - You are roleblock and control immune. You are informed if a roleblock or control is blocked by this attribute.

desc:
Post 4686
*Yeah I get stung all the time. Nowadays I barely react to it anymore.*
